name: perplexideez
description: Search the web and your self-hosted apps using local AI agents.
readme_summary: Perplexideez is a self-hosted, AI-powered search application built with Svelte. It allows users to search the web and their self-hosted applications using local AI agents, backed by a Postgres database and either Ollama or OpenAI compatible endpoints. It integrates with SearXNG for web searches and offers features like multi-user support, customizable models, and sharing capabilities.
key_features: Deployment via Docker, Kubernetes, or bare metal
primary_use_case: Self-hosted AI-powered search across the web and personal applications.
cover_image_prompt: A librarian in a futuristic library, using a glowing magnifying glass to examine scattered data fragments floating around them. The magnifying glass focuses the data into a clear, concise stream of information displayed on a nearby holographic screen. The librarian is surrounded by towering shelves filled with both physical books and glowing data servers. Small UI elements showing search queries and source links subtly connect the metaphor to software. The scene is set in a softly lit, organized library with a blue and gold color scheme. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: naturaltime
description: ðŸ•’ Go library for parsing natural language time expressions with exceptional range support
readme_summary: The `naturaltime` Go library parses natural language time expressions, including dates, times, and ranges. It leverages the `chrono-node` JavaScript library for advanced parsing capabilities, offering a Go-friendly API for extracting time information from human-readable text. The library also has active development on a pure Go implementation.
key_features: Parse natural language date expressions into `time.Time` objects
Extract specific dates or date ranges
Support for multiple time ranges in a single expression
primary_use_case: Parsing natural language time expressions to extract dates, times, and ranges for applications requiring human-readable time input.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled clockmaker meticulously crafting a giant clock from clouds, each cloud representing a different natural language time expression. The clockmaker uses special tools to shape the clouds into precise gears and hands, which accurately display the parsed time. Small UI elements float around the clock, showing snippets of Go code and the resulting `time.Time` objects. The scene is set in a bright, airy workshop filled with clockmaking tools and digital displays. The composition is focused on the clockmaker and the cloud clock, with a clean and organized layout. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and rich details.

name: chatbox
description: User-friendly Desktop Client App for AI Models/LLMs (GPT, Claude, Gemini, Ollama...)
readme_summary: Chatbox is a user-friendly desktop client application designed to interact with various AI models and Large Language Models (LLMs) such as GPT, Claude, Gemini, and Ollama. It provides a unified interface for accessing and utilizing these AI models on Windows, macOS, and Linux, offering a convenient way to engage with AI technology.
key_features: Supports GPT, Claude, Gemini, Ollama, and other LLMs
Available on Windows, macOS, and Linux
Community Edition open-sourced under GPLv3 license
Mobile app available for iOS and Android
primary_use_case: Providing a desktop application for users to interact with various AI models and LLMs in a unified and user-friendly environment.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a friendly robot sitting at a modern desk, surrounded by glowing screens displaying various chat interfaces (GPT, Claude, etc.). The robot acts as a central switchboard, seamlessly routing user requests to different AI models represented by colorful, ethereal clouds hovering nearby. Each cloud emits a unique glow, reflecting the AI's personality. The desk is clean and minimalist, with subtle code snippets and data visualizations projected onto its surface. The scene is bathed in soft, ambient light, creating a welcoming and futuristic atmosphere. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and rich details.

name: DevExtreme
description: HTML5 JavaScript Component Suite for Responsive Web Development
readme_summary: DevExtreme is a suite of UI components for building responsive web applications using Angular, React, Vue, and jQuery. It provides a range of components like data grids, charts, and widgets, designed to work across different devices and screen sizes.
key_features: Support for Angular, React, Vue, and jQuery
primary_use_case: Building enterprise-ready web applications with rich UI components.
cover_image_prompt: A master craftsman sitting at a workbench, assembling intricate clockwork gears representing different UI components (grids, charts, forms). Each gear is labeled with framework logos (Angular, React, Vue, jQuery). The craftsman carefully connects these gears to a central, glowing screen displaying a responsive web application adapting to different device sizes (phone, tablet, desktop). Digital particles flow between the gears, symbolizing data. The repository name 'DevExtreme' is subtly etched onto the workbench. The scene is brightly lit with a focus on clarity and precision. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: DevExtreme
description: HTML5 JavaScript Component Suite for Responsive Web Development
readme_summary: DevExtreme is a suite of UI components for building responsive web applications. It supports popular front-end frameworks like Angular, React, Vue, and jQuery, offering a range of components including data grids, charts, and widgets for creating engaging user interfaces across different devices and screen sizes.
key_features: Support for Angular, React, Vue, and jQuery
primary_use_case: Building enterprise-ready web applications with rich user interfaces.
cover_image_prompt: A master craftsman at a high-tech workbench, assembling intricate clockwork gears (representing UI components) into a smooth-running machine (a web application). Each gear is labeled with icons representing different UI elements like grids, charts, and forms. Digital blueprints float above the workbench, showing the structure of the application. The craftsman uses specialized tools that emit glowing particles as they connect the gears. A small screen on the workbench displays live data flowing through the application. The scene is set in a brightly lit workshop with a clean, organized aesthetic. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and sharp details.
